perturbation.original_text:
1.1     "Spinrecords.com Brand Features" means the SpinRecords.com name and
logo  and  other  trademarks,  trade  names  and service names including but not
limited  to  those set forth on Exhibit A attached hereto and incorporated herein
                               ---------
by  reference  and  all  Intellectual  Property  Rights  related  thereto.
SpinRecords.com  Brand  Features  shall include any derivatives, improvements or
modifications  thereto  or  thereof and any Intellectual Property rights related
thereto.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.1     "Spinrecords.com Brand Assets" means the SpinRecords.com name and
logo  and  other  trademarks,  trade  names  and service names including but not
limited  to  those set forth on Exhibit A attached hereto and incorporated herein
                               ---------
by  reference  and  all  Intellectual  Property  Rights  related  thereto.
SpinRecords.com  Brand  Features  shall include any derivatives, improvements or
modifications  thereto  or  thereof and any Intellectual Property rights related
thereto.
perturbation.explanation: Using "Spinrecords.com Brand Assets" instead of "Spinrecords.com Brand Features" in the definition, but subsequently using "Spinrecords.com Brand Features" creates confusion. The document fails to clarify if "Spinrecords.com Brand Assets" and "Spinrecords.com Brand Features" refer to the same or different set of properties. This discrepancy may lead to disputes concerning the brand features that are covered under the agreement.

perturbation.original_text:
2.1     The  SpinRecords.com  Pages.  SpinRecords.com  shall  brand  the
             ---------------------------
Source: RAE SYSTEMS INC, 10-Q, 11/14/2000

SpinRecords.com Pages with the NETTAXI Brand Features in the manner set forth in
the  Statement  of  Work.  NETTAXI will provide electronic copies of the NETTAXI
Brand  Features  upon SpinRecords.com's request. All Spinrecords.com Pages shall
display  appropriate intellectual property legends, including but not limited to
the  copyright  notice  and  trademark  references.
perturbation.changed_text:
2.1     The  SpinRecords.com  Website.  SpinRecords.com  shall  brand  the
             ---------------------------
Source: RAE SYSTEMS INC, 10-Q, 11/14/2000

SpinRecords.com Pages with the NETTAXI Brand Features in the manner set forth in
the  Statement  of  Work.  NETTAXI will provide electronic copies of the NETTAXI
Brand  Features  upon SpinRecords.com's request. All Spinrecords.com Pages shall
display  appropriate intellectual property legends, including but not limited to
the  copyright  notice  and  trademark  references.
perturbation.explanation: Interchanging "SpinRecords.com Pages" with "SpinRecords.com Website" raises ambiguity. While the subsequent text refers to "SpinRecords.com Pages," the change in the section heading implies a different scope. The contract does not define if the "Website" and "Pages" are the same. The change suggests there are different branding obligations for the different entities, and it's unclear which sections of the website constitute "pages".

perturbation.original_text:
5.5     SpinRecords.com  Rate. In full consideration for the rights granted
             ---------------------
by  NETTAXI,  SpinRecords.com  agrees  to  pay NETTAXI fifty (50%) percent of ad
revenue  at  an  average  rate  no lower then $6.50 per one thousand impressions
(CPM)  payable  to  NETTAXI  which  results when the SpinRecords.com Advertising
Revenue  is  multiplied by SpinRecords.com's AR Share.  SpinRecords.com shall be
responsible  for  payment  of  all taxes based on the Advertising Revenue except
taxes  based  on  NETTAXI's  income.
perturbation.changed_text:
5.5     SpinRecords.com  Payment. In full consideration for the rights granted
             ---------------------
by  NETTAXI,  SpinRecords.com  agrees  to  pay NETTAXI fifty (50%) percent of ad
revenue  at  an  average  rate  no lower then $6.50 per one thousand impressions
(CPM)  payable  to  NETTAXI  which  results when the SpinRecords.com Advertising
Revenue  is  multiplied by SpinRecords.com's AR Share.  SpinRecords.com shall be
responsible  for  payment  of  all taxes based on the Advertising Revenue except
taxes  based  on  NETTAXI's  income.
perturbation.explanation: Changing the term "Rate" to "Payment" can create confusion regarding whether this section describes the specific financial amount (rate) or the general obligation to remit payment (payment). Because "Rate" can be the agreed figure for value, while Payment is the action of doing it, the lack of consistency may lead to conflict around calculating the advertisement revenue due.
